name: GyroSpace
description:
GyroSpace is a fast paced racing game using your smartphone's gyroscope as the only controller.
You control the direction of your GyroShip by aiming with your phone in every direction.

Here's a quick demonstration video

Controls :   
-Looking at your feet will make your GyroShip go down, looking at the ceiling will make it go up. 
-Shake your phone forward to trigger your bonus boost on lap 2 and 3.

Dev note :Making an F-zero GX inspired game wasn't my first goals for this project. I wanted to make a shoot-em-up using the gyroscope but the "tube" level design was very clunky for the shooting mechanics so I got rid of it. What was left was pretty close from the feeling that I had playing F-zero GX for the first time when I was little so I decided to keep rolling with it.

There's still a lot to do for this project, a lot of polish and bugfixes but I'm pretty confident in what I made so far.
